title: ISic002931. Epitaph of Benantia
body:
Facsimile Images

((cross_latin)) Memoria Benan-
ti hic requiscit
i[n p]ạc̣ẹ qui bixit
anno[s. 4.] qui dẹ[po]
5situs e[st in]ḍ(ictione) IIIX ((cross_latin))

Apparatus criticus

Line.4: ann[is]: Lo Faro, Manganaro

translation

commentary

Wrongly attributed to the Arangio Hypogeum I by Manganaro

bibliography

  • 2012.0623 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • Manganaro 1993 585 no.11 fig.28 ph https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001827
  • Lo Faro 2010 58 no.21 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002642
